The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 17 October is 4,346 (503 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 October, there were 377 new confirmed cases (43.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 October, there were 309 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 22% ( 68 extra cases).
